articles.description: Gary Hollywood, who used to feature in the sitcom, is taking action against the main man Brendan O’Carroll, according to reports
articles.content:
A fallout at one of the country's most popular television shows is set for the courts, according to reports.
Mrs Brown's Boys has again been central to the BBC's Christmas TV schedules - but the man… [+1967 chars]
